channel.title: Posts on John Inman
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on John Inman

item.title: Under the Weather, Part 1
item.description: This series presents an hedonic analysis of fog in the city of Seaside, CA, near the Monterey Peninsula. Hedonic analysis is a method of estimating the value of something that does not have a price. The inspiration for this series was a school assignment I originally collaborated on with Winn McEnery. Part 1 focuses on creating a high-resolution (250 m) fog map using MODIS satellite from NASA. MODIS The Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) is a remote sensing instrument that collects data about the Earth’s surface and atmosphere.
